mapper.select: SELECT ID, EXHUST_ID, TKILN_ID, k.NK_NO, KILN_NO, KILN_MODEL, FUNCTION_dec, FUNCTIO, fueltype_dec, fueltype, MODEL_DEC, MODEL, KILN_FUEL_AUSAGE, KILN_FUEL_AUSAGEUNIT, NITREREMOVEDEC, NITREREMOVEID, DUSTREMOVEDEC, DUSTREMOVEID, SULPHURREMOVEDEC, SULPHURREMOVEID, k.EXF_NO, COALASH, coal_volatilisation, COALSULFUR, factor_pm25, factor_pm10, PM10, PM25, factor_pm, factor_co, CO, factor_voc, VOC, PM, factor_so2, SO2, factor_nox, NOX, factor_nh3, NH3, factor_oc, OC, factor_status, factor_bc, BC, SCCCODE, so2out, noxout, pmout, feiqiti, Jan_useamount, Feb_useamount, Mar_useamount, Apr_useamount, May_useamount, June_useamount, July_useamount, aug_useamount, sept_useamount, oct_use_amount, nov_useamount, dec_useamount from kiln k join exhaust e on k.EXHUST_ID = e.EXF_ID WHERE FACTORY_ID = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
